scripts.text:
UPDATE product
SET 
    market_price = JSON_VALUE(REPLACE(prices, '''', '"'), '$[0].price'),
    lenskart_price = JSON_VALUE(REPLACE(prices, '''', '"'),Â '$[1].price');

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT
    t.order_id,
    t.transaction_id AS transaction_id,
    t.customer_id AS customer_id,
    t.product_id AS product_id,
    t.store_id AS store_id,
    t.quantity AS quantity,
    t.order_date AS order_date,
    t.quantity * p.Lenskart_price AS revenue
FROM
    transactions t
JOIN
    product p ON t.product_id = p.id;
